Tank Man (nke a makwaara dịka onye na-eme ngagharị iwe a na-amaghị ama ma ọ bụ onye nnupụisi a na-akpọghị aha) bụ aha njirimara nke nwoke China a na-akọwaghị aha ya nke guzo n'ihu kọlụm nke tankị Type 59 na-ahapụ Tiananmen Square na Beijing na June 5, 1989, ụbọchị mgbe mmegide ike nke gọọmentị China na-eme na ngagharị iwe Tiananmen
Ka tankị na-eduzi na-agafe nwoke ahụ, ọ gbanwere ọnọdụ ya ugboro ugboro iji gbochie ụzọ tankị ahụ gbara ya gburugburu
E mere ihe nkiri nke ihe omume ahụ ma kọọrọ ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile
Na mba ụwa, a na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ihe oyiyi kachasị mma n'oge niile. N'ime China, onyinyo ahụ na ihe omume ndị na-eso ya bụ ndị a na-enyocha.

Enweghị ozi a pụrụ ịdabere na ya banyere njirimara ma ọ bụ ọdịnihu nke nwoke ahụ; akụkọ banyere ihe mere ndị ọrụ tankị amaghị. Ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye akaebe ekwuola na Tank Man abụghị naanị onye gbochiri tankị ahụ n'oge ngagharị iwe ahụ, mana Tank Man pụrụ iche n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị ya ka e sere foto ma dekọọ na vidiyo.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1998, Time gụnyere "Onye nnupụisi a na-amaghị ama" n'ihe akpọrọ "Time 100: The Most Important People of the Century"
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2016, Time gụnyere foto Jeff Widener na "Time 100: The Most Influential Images of All Time".
Òtù Electro-industrial Skinny Puppy dekọrọ ma wepụta egwu "Tin Omen" dịka ihe na-ezo aka na ngagharị iwe ahụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1989, a tọhapụrụ ya na abọm ha bụ Rabies na okwu ndị na-ekwu "nnupụisi na-enweghị ime ihe ike", "ụgbọ agha na-abịa", "gwara ụwa ihe na-eme" na "na-eme ka igwefoto dị ndụ".
Vidio egwu afọ 1994 maka "Refuse/Resist" site na egwu thrash / death metal Sepultura gosipụtara ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke Tank Man.
Vidio egwu maka Michael Jackson's "They Don't Care About Us (Prison Version) " gosipụtara obere ihe nkiri nke Tank Man.
